name: The Role of Dice
description:
Fight through hordes of deviant dice to prove yourself as the One True Die.

Objective:

Survive through as many waves of dice as possible!

Controls:

  • Select 4 cards to build your die for this turn.
  • Press ROLL to play your turn.
  • You can't start a turn with negative gold.
  • Use A + D (or left/right arrows) to influence the die's movement.
  • The side that lands face up is the action your character will perform.
  • Press esc for menu/credits.
